thread.title: Sushant Singh cuts his hair for M.S. Dhoni's biopic
thread.title_full: Sushant Singh cuts his hair for M.S. Dhoni's biopic

author: Oct 09
title: Sushant Singh cuts his hair for M.S. Dhoni's biopic
text:
Sushant Singh cuts his hair for M.S. Dhoni's biopic Oct 09, 2015, Agencies: Sushant Singh Rajput is always seen taking keen interest in the characters he plays on-screen. The 29-year-old has now got a new haircut for playing the role of legendary cricketer M.S. Dhoni in the upcoming biopic. 

After successfully wrapping up the first schedule, Sushant has now started shooting for the second schedule of MS Dhoni, reports the Hindustan Times. 

Sushant was sporting long hair for quite some time for the first schedule. 

Sushant kept himself away from public appearances and spent over a year to grow and style his hair. 

The actor underwent rigorous training to attain the perfect physique required for Dhoni's biopic. The film is directed by Neeraj Pandey.
